details_description: Reach Champion League in Arena to unlock this event. This stage occurs across three rounds - Round One (Opens), Round Two (Top 1000 Duos per region) and Round Three (Top 50 Duos per region). The top 20 Duos from Round Three in each region will advance to the Season Finals. Teams will also accumulate Series Points based on each week's results, and top performers will be invited to the Season Finals. Full rules at fortnite.com/competitive
flavor_description: Compete in the Fortnite Champion Series: Chapter 2 - Season 2 for a share of the $5,000,000 total prize pool.

details_description: Unlock this tournament by playing Ranked Battle Royale. You must be in Gold or higher in Battle Royale to unlock this tournament. This tournament occurs across two rounds, with the top players from Round 1 advancing to Round 2. EU, NA - Top 7500; BR, ASIA - Top 5000. OCE, ME - Top 2500. Players will win cash prizes for achieving a Victory Royale in Round 2. There will be no other placement prizes. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled and an account level of 15 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/news.
flavor_description: Reach Round 2. Claim a Victory Royale. Earn cash prizes!

details_description: Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the FNCS Trial or by advancing through FNCS Division 2. Qualification to the Division 1 Weekly Final is based on your performance across both Division 1 sessions each week, with the top 33 teams in each region qualifying to the Weekly Final. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/news.

details_description: This is a two-day event with 12 matches to crown the FNCS Major champions. The Major champions will not only claim their share of the prize pool — and their title as the best Fortnite players in the region — but will also wield the Blade of Champions for the following season, displaying their achievement for all to see! Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. For more details see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

details_description: Advance to the Group Stage by qualifying through the Play-In! The Group Stage will consist of three groups in EU and NAC, and two groups in all other regions. Every Victory Royale in the Group Stage is an instant qualification to the Major Finals! The most consistent trios in each group (top five in EU and NAC, top 10 in all other regions) will also advance to the Major Finals. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. details_description: This event is testing our tournament system and game performance at the highest level of competition for the latest update. Cash prizes will be awarded to top players at the conclusion of Round 2's test event. Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled, have participated in at least 14 different tournaments within the last 180 days, and have an account level of 350 or greater. details_description: Compete against other Bronze & Silver ranked players! You must be in Bronze or Silver in Battle Royale Ranked. You may play as many games as you wish during the 4 hour window, but only your top 4 matches will count towards your placement on the leaderboard! In any session, earn 50 points to earn the "Ranker's Shogun 'Brella" In-Game Glider! Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled and an account level of 50 or greater. For more details see: www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library.

details_description: Compete against other Bronze, Silver, & Gold ranked players! You must be in Bronze, Silver, or Gold in Battle Royale Ranked. Go Go Go! Drop into Round 1, a 45-minute session where duos can play up to three matches, with only the best match counting on the leaderboard. Only your first five eliminations in each match will contribute to your match score. The top duos in each region advance to Round 2 and are sorted into one of three groups based on their Round 1 point total: Group 1 (15+ points), Group 2 (10-14 points), and Group 3 (1-9 points). Round 2 mirrors the structure of Round 1, with duos again playing up to three matches in 40 minutes. Duos who place high enough on the Group 1 Round 2 Leaderboard will earn the Aces Wild Card Bundle!

Go Go Go! Drop into Round 1, a 45-minute session where duos can play up to three matches, with only the best match counting on the leaderboard. Only your first five eliminations in each match will contribute to your match score. The top duos in each region advance to Round 2 and are sorted into one of three groups based on their Round 1 point total: Group 1 (15+ points), Group 2 (10-14 points), and Group 3 (1-9 points). Round 2 mirrors the structure of Round 1, with duos again playing up to three matches in 40 minutes. Duos who place high enough on the Group 1 Round 2 Leaderboard will earn the Blade of Champions!

details_description: Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the previous season, or by advancing through Division 2. Qualification to the Division 1 Weekly Final is based on your performance across both Division 1 sessions each week, with the top 33 teams in each region qualifying to the Weekly Final.

Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the previous season or by advancing through Division 2. Qualification to the Division 1 Weekly Final is based on your performance across both Division 1 sessions each week, with the top 50 teams in each region qualifying to the Weekly Final.

Unlock this practice divisional cup by qualifying from the previous season or by advancing through Division 3. Qualification to Division 1 is based on your performance across both Division 2 sessions each week. EU & NAC: top 40 will advance to Division 1; NAW, BR, ASIA, OCE, ME: top 20 will advance to Division 1.

Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the Duos Trial or by advancing through Division 3. Qualification to Division 1 is based on your performance in Division 2, with the top 50 teams from each Division 2 Cup window in all regions advancing.

Unlock this practice divisional cup by reaching Gold or higher in Battle Royale, Zero Build, or Reload Ranked. Qualification to Division 2 is based on your performance across both Division 3 sessions each week. EU: top 300 will advance to Division 2; NAC: top 200 will advance to Division 2; NAW, BR, ASIA, OCE: top 100 will advance to Division 2.

Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the Duos Trial or by advancing through Division 4. Qualification to Division 2 is based on your performance in Division 3, with the top 100 teams from each Division 3 Cup window in all regions advancing.

Unlock this divisional cup by qualifying from the Duos Trial or by advancing through Division 5. Qualification to Division 3 is based on your performance in Division 4, with the top 200 teams from each Division 4 Cup window in EU and NAC advancing.

Unlock this divisional cup by playing Ranked. You and your teammate must be ranked in Gold or higher in Battle Royale, Zero Build, or Reload Ranked to unlock this tournament. Qualification to Division 4 is based on your performance in Division 5, with the top 300 teams from each Division 5 Cup window in EU and NAC advancing.
It's time to duo up and compete for the opportunity to win a cash prize! Reach Round 2 where every duo who earns a Victory Royale in Round 2 will earn $200 USD - good luck and have fun!

It's time to Duo Up! Unlock this tournament by playing Ranked. You and your teammate must be ranked in Gold or higher in Battle Royale, Zero Build, or Reload Ranked to unlock this tournament. This tournament consists of a single session. The top 1,000 duos will be placed into Division 2. In EU and NAC, Duos placing 1,001st - 3,000th will be placed into Division 3. In EU, duos placing 3,001st - 13,000th place will be placed into Division 4; in NAC, duos placing 3,001st - 7,000th will be placed into Division 4.

It's Spooky Szn! Drop into the Early Access Cups for a chance to win access to The Dark Maw Outfit! The top 25% of Duos in each region get early access to the brand new Reload Map on October 9! Winning players will receive their outfit reward on October 9th.

Go Go Go! Drop into Round 1, a 45-minute session where duos can play up to three matches, with only the best match counting on the leaderboard. Only your first five eliminations in each match will contribute to your match score. The top duos in each region advance to Round 2 and are sorted into one of three groups based on their Round 1 point total: Group 1 (15+ points), Group 2 (10-14 points), and Group 3 (1-9 points). Round 2 mirrors the structure of Round 1, with duos again playing up to three matches in 40 minutes. Duos who place high enough on the Group 1 Round 2 Leaderboard will earn the Elite Zadie Outfit!

The Fortnite World Cup champion is bringing some FNCS style to the 2025 Fortnite Global Championship celebration! Duo up for the opporturnity to earn the "Champion Bugha" outfit! Players who earn 8 points will win the "Sweatin'" Spray!

Clix is back with some new FNCS flair to celebrate the 2025 Fortnite Global Championship! Duo up for the opportunity to earn the "Champion Clix" outfit! Players who earn 8 points will win the "Sweatin'" Spray!

Lachlan returns with a new FNCS look to celebrate the 2025 Fortnite Global Championship! Duo up for the opportunity to earn the “Champion Lachlan” outfit! Players who earn 8 points will win the "Sweatin'" Spray!

Loserfruit is joining the 2025 Fortnite Global Championship celebration with some signature FNCS style! Duo up for the opportunity to earn the “Champion Loserfruit” outfit! Players who earn 8 points will win the "Sweatin'" Spray!
Thirty three of the world's best FNCS trios will battle for a share of the $2,001,000 prize pool. Tune in to the action at twitch.tv/fortnite to see who is crowned as champion!
Kai Cenat is breaking into Fortnite and joining the Icon Series! Drop into his tournament for a chance to win early access to his bundle!
The iconic MrSavage is joining the Icon Series! Drop into his Duos Battle Royale tournament for a chance to win early access to his bundle!
It's Spooky Szn! Duo up and drop in to the new Reload map: Nitemare Island! This is an early access play session and there will be no scoring or prizing associated with this event.

You must be Duos Division 1 to participate in this event. This event is testing our tournament system and game performance at the highest level of competition for the latest update. As we're gathering performance data actively during this event, you may experience moments of low performance. This event will occur over two rounds, with the top 50 teams advancing to Round 2. Cash prizes will be awarded to top players at the conclusion of Round 2's test event.
Go Go Power Rangers! Hop into the Pink Ranger Cup and compete to win the Pink Ranger Outfit before it hits the Shop!
Play in this single-round tournament to win the Champion PJ FNCS bundle! Gain 8 points to win the PJ's Dream spray and 40 points to win the FNCS Hardshell back bling!
Progress to the final round to compete to win a cash prize! The top 100 players at the end of Round 1 will advance to the Finals.
Compete against other ranked players! You may play 10 matches during the three hour window. In any session, earn 50 points to earn the "Ranked O.X.R. 'Brella" In-Game Glider!
Compete against other ranked players! You may play 10 matches during the three hour window. In any session, earn 50 points to earn the "Ranked O.X.R. 'Brella" In-Game Glider!
Compete against other ranked players! You may play 10 matches during the three hour window. In any session, earn 50 points to earn the "Ranked O.X.R. 'Brella" In-Game Glider!
Go Go Power Rangers! Hop into the Red Ranger Cup and compete to win the Red Ranger Outfit before it hits the Shop!

Go Go Go! Each Reload Quick Cup kicks off with Round 1, a 45-minute session where duos can play up to three matches, with only the best match counting on the leaderboard. Only your first five eliminations in each match will contribute to your match score. The top duos in each region advance to Round 2 and are sorted into one of three groups based on their Round 1 point total: Group 1 (15+ points), Group 2 (10-14 points), and Group 3 (1-9 points). Round 2 mirrors the structure of Round 1, with duos again playing up to three matches in 40 minutes (where all matches count). Only Group 1 duos are eligible to advance to Round 3, with the top 20 from each region progressing. Round 3 will consist of three scheduled matches, where each Victory Royale winner will win a cash prize! Good luck and have fun!

Drop into the Solo Series! This tournament series will span six weeks, with one window each week. Each player's top four weekly performances will count toward qualification for the Solo Series Final, with the top 100 players in each region advancing. Good luck and have fun!

details_description: Reach Champion League in Arena mode to unlock this event. This tournament occurs across three rounds - Round One (Opens), Round Two (Top 1,000 per region) and Round Three (Top 150 per region). The top 8 teams from Round Three in each region will advance to the Season Finals at the end of Season X. Teams will also accumulate Series Points based on each week's final placements tracked on the Series Leaderboard. Every week counts, as top performers on the Series Leaderboard will be invited to fill out the remaining slots for the Season Finals. Full rules, eligibility details, qualification spots per region, Series Leaderboard, and prize distribution are available at www.fortnite.com/championseries-x
